caption: The video begins with a man piloting a spacecraft, who skillfully completes his piloting mission and safely returns to the ground. Then, like a regular office worker, he goes back to his dormitory, plays with his pet after work, and then goes into rest mode. Quickly, it reaches the next day, and he begins another test flight mission. Likewise, on this day, he also completes his mission with excellence.
